wsdl:definitions.wsdl:documentation:
APIConnector for integration with our email marketing system

  • You may only access this system when the account you are using has been granted API permission.
  • Furthermore, you may not use your main account - a separate login must be created within your account, for use with the API.
  • All datetime parameters are expected to be in UTC, and datetimes will be returned in UTC. Please call GetServerTime if in doubt.

wsdl:operation.name: ListContactsInAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts in a given address book

wsdl:operation.name: ListContactsInAddressBookWithFullData
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts in a given address book, returning all data fields (slower; please consider ListContactsInAddressBook as a faster option)

wsdl:operation.name: ListModifiedContacts
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who were modified between two specified dates.

wsdl:operation.name: ListUnsubscribersAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who have unsubscribed from a given address book

wsdl:operation.name: ListModifiedContacts2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieve a list of modified contacts after a specified date. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListNewContacts
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieve a list of new contacts, created after a specified date. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListModifiedContactsInAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who were modified between two specified dates, in a given address book

wsdl:operation.name: ListModifiedContactsInAddressBook2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who were modified since a given date, in a given address book

wsdl:operation.name: ListHardBouncingContacts
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who hard bounced when sending a particular campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: ListHardBouncesContacts2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who hard bounces when sending a particular campaign. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListHardBouncingContactsWithLabels
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who hard bounced when sending a particular campaign, along with specified data labels.

wsdl:operation.name: ListHardBouncingContactsWithLabels2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who hard bounced when sending a particular campaign, along with specified data labels. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignActivities
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who were sent a campaign. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignOpeners
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of openers of a campaign, along with their statistics. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignClickers
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of clickers of a campaign, along with their statistics. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignClickers2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of clickers of a campaign, along with their statistics. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignActivitiesSinceDate
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of contacts who were sent a campaign, and retrieves only those contacts who responded (e.g. clicked, opened) after a specified date. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactActivity
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves activity for a given contact and campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: ListUnsubscribers
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of unsubscribers who unsubscribed after a given date

wsdl:operation.name: ListSuppressedContacts
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieve a list of suppressed contacts along with the reason for suppression.You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateContact
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a contact

wsdl:operation.name: CreateDataField
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a contact data field

wsdl:operation.name: DeleteDataField
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Deletes a contact data field

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateContact
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Updates an existing contact

wsdl:operation.name: AddContactToAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Adds a contact to a given address book

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveContactFromAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes or unsubscribes a contact from a given address book. If totalUnsubscribe is set to true, the contact will be completely removed from the account (you may wish to specify -1 as the addressbook ID in this case).

wsdl:operation.name: RemoveAllContactsFromAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Removes all contacts from a given address book. If totalUnsubscribe is set to true, the contact will be completely removed from the account (you may wish to specify -1 as the addressbook ID in this case).

wsdl:operation.name: GetContactByEmail
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a contact using an email address

wsdl:operation.name: GetContactById
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a contact using the ID. Unsubscribed or suppressed contacts will not be retrieved.

wsdl:operation.name: AddContactsToAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Bulk creates, or bulk updates, contacts. Import format can either be CSV or Excel. Must include one column called "Email". Any other columns will attempt to map to your custom data fields. Use this method to stay within your API limits.

wsdl:operation.name: AddContactsToAddressBookWithProgress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Bulk creates, or bulk updates, contacts. Import format can either be CSV or Excel. Must include one column called "Email". Any other columns will attempt to map to your custom data fields. The returned token (a GUID) can be used to query import progress. Use this method to stay within your API limits.

wsdl:operation.name: GetContactImportProgress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Determines the import status of a previously started contact import.

wsdl:operation.name: GetCampaignSendProgress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Determines the send status using a token returned by SendCampaignToAddressBooksWithProgress.

wsdl:operation.name: GetContactImportReport
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a report with statistics about what was successfully imported, and what was unable to be imported

wsdl:operation.name: GetContactImportReportFaults
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets all records that were not successfully imported. The data are returned in a base64 encoded CSV file, which is UTF-8 encoded. This data will only be available for approximately one week after import.

wsdl:operation.name: ListAddressBooks
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: List all address books for the current account.

wsdl:operation.name: ListContactDataLabels
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of contact data labels in an account.

wsdl:operation.name: ListAddressBooksForContact
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists any address books that a contact is in.

wsdl:operation.name: ListAddressBooksForCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists any address books that a campaign has ever been sent to.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignsForAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists any campaigns that have been sent to an address book.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates an address book

wsdl:operation.name: DeleteAddressBook
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Deletes an address book

wsdl:operation.name: GetAddressBookContactCount
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the amount of contacts in a given address book.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactReplies
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of campaign replies for a contact. You may not request more than 5 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactClicks
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of campaign link clicks for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactClicks2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of campaign link clicks for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactPageViews
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of page views for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactOpens
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of campaign opens for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactRoiDetail
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves a list of ROI information for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: GetCampaignContactForwardInfo
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves campaign forward or estimated forward information for a contact. Specify true using "getEstimated" to return estimated forwards.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaignContactSocialBookmarkViews
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Retrieves campaign social bookmark views for a contact. You may not request more than 1000 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information.

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaigns
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists all campaigns for the current account. If you have over 500 campaigns, please use ListCampaigns2 instead. Please note that only the basic campaign data will be returned (not the content).

wsdl:operation.name: ListCampaigns2
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists all campaigns for the current account. You may not request more than 500 records at a time using the "select" parameter. Use the select and skip feature to retrieve all information. Please note that only the basic campaign data will be returned (not the content).

wsdl:operation.name: ListAvailableCustomFromAddresses
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists available custom from addresses for the current account.

wsdl:operation.name: SetCampaignCustomFromAddress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Changes the custom from address of a campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: ListSentCampaignsWithActivitySinceDate
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Lists all sent campaigns, which have had activity after a specified date (e.g. clicks, opens).

wsdl:operation.name: GetCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a specified campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: IsSplitTestCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Indicates if the supplied campaign id is a split test campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: GetCampaignSummary
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Gets a summary of reporting information for a specified campaign.

wsdl:operation.name: SendCampaignToAddressBooks
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a specified campaign to one or more address books at a specified time. Leave the address book array empty to send to All Contacts.

wsdl:operation.name: SendCampaignToAddressBooksWithProgress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a specified campaign to one or more address books at a specified time. The returned token (a GUID) can be used to query send progress. Leave the address book array empty to send to All Contacts.

wsdl:operation.name: SendSplitTestCampaignToAddressBookWithProgress
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a specified split test campaign to one or more address books at a specified time. The returned token (a GUID) can be used to query send progress. Leave the address book array empty to send to All Contacts.

wsdl:operation.name: SendCampaignToContact
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a campaign to a specified contact.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Creates a campaign. Will be validated before saving.

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateCampaign
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Updates a given campaign. Will be validated before saving.

wsdl:operation.name: GetServerTime
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the UTC time as set on the server.

wsdl:operation.name: SendSingleSMSMessage
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Sends a single SMS message. Sufficient credit is required or this method will fail.

wsdl:service.name: API
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation:
APIConnector for integration with our email marketing system

  • You may only access this system when the account you are using has been granted API permission.
  • Furthermore, you may not use your main account - a separate login must be created within your account, for use with the API.
  • All datetime parameters are expected to be in UTC, and datetimes will be returned in UTC. Please call GetServerTime if in doubt.
